data.rules: # Performance Applied when loading assets, rendering pages, or optimizing UX. ## Core Web Vitals Targets - LCP: < 2.5s - INP: < 200ms - CLS: < 0.1 ## IMAGE_OPTIMIZATION - DO: Use Next.js . Specify width/height. Use priority only for above-fold LCP images. - NEVER: Use without dimensions. ## FONT_LOADING - DO: Use next/font. Preload primary weight. Max 2 families, 3-4 weights total. - NEVER: Load from Google Fonts CDN directly. ## BUNDLE_SIZE - DO: Check bundlephobia before adding deps. Dynamic import() for non-critical components. Tree-shake imports. - NEVER: Import entire libraries for one function. ## LAYOUT_SHIFT_PREVENTION - DO: Reserve space for images. Use skeletons matching content dimensions. - NEVER: Render content that pushes other content down after initial paint. ## CODE_SPLITTING - DO: Use next/dynamic for heavy components. Load modals dynamically.
